Name: Statuette of a man
Description: The statuette represents a man with his left foot advanced. He wears a long garment with a protruding front part and lowered at the abdomen. The elongated head with no wig on it is shaven. The arms had been originally pegged to the body. The body is painted dark brown, the whites and the garment are white, the brows, eyelids and pupils are black.
